'''Beechbone''' was a notably tall and handsome [[Ents|Ent]].

==History==
On [[3 March]] {{TA|3019}}<ref>{{App|Great}}</ref> he was caught in a burning spray sent up by [[Saruman]] from beneath the [[Ring of Isengard]], but his fiery end brought his fellow Ents to the peak of their destructive anger.<ref>{{TT|III9}}</ref>
